page.title: 11Housing in Insch.
page.content: Insch is a growing community situated in the North_Eastern part of Garioch, with a number of housing developments continuing at present. Mansell Watson is building houses at Dunnydeer Park, and just off Western Road, Span Construction are developing a site. Recently finished is the sheltered housing at Foundland Court for the old age pensioners.Presently under con_ struction is a development for senior citizens in Denwell Road. The older houses are made of either granite or stone and lime but the more modern houses are made of timber and blockwork and are called,"Kit Houses". About a year ago the houses in Church Terrace were modernized because their window frames were rotten and they were not very warm.New doors and windows were fitted,as was central heating.The residents were very happy.
